short_summary: Ruggedized Tablets for Natural Resources Canada

tags: Automatic Data Processing Equipment, System Configuration
full_summary:
===============

## Solicitation No.: 2BH2135920/A

### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Ruggedized Tablets

Natural Resources Canada is seeking to procure ruggedized tablets as per the Statement of Requirement outlined in the Request for Quotation. The procurement is governed by the Canada-Quebec Agreement.

### Tender Overview

* **Description of Requirement**: Natural Resources Canada requires 16 firm deliverables and 10 client options of ruggedized tablets.
* **Delivery Location**: Quebec
* **Delivery Date**: 30 federal government working days from contract award
* **Security Requirements**: None
* **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements**: None

### Tender Submission

* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* To access the solicitation and submit a bid, click on the following link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

### Contact Information

For all inquiries, please address them in writing to:

* Colin McKennirey
* Procurement Officer
* Shared Services Canada
* 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor
* Ottawa, Ontario K2P 4N1
* Email: [colin.mckennirey@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:colin.mckennirey@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 572-8718

### Trade Agreements

The procurement is governed by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Notice Period

The notice period for this solicitation is 15 days, from February 22, 2023, to March 8, 2023. After this period, the tender will close, and no further bids will be accepted.

### Tenders Closed

Please note that the tender closing date is March 8, 2023, at 14:00:00. The tender status is `Expired`. Further information is only available through the official government tender portal
